title: [GAMEPLAY] Karthus' Voice Not Functioning Properly
body: When using the Ctrl+(1,2,3,4) in Karthus, it seems that Karthus isn't saying one of his quotes for the entire game.

replies.body: none of his moving lines work either

Hey Red Ezreal! 

Thanks for taking the time to report this! We're aware of the issue and are working to get a fix in ASAP!

On the subject of bugfixes. can we get a fix on his Q when he's in his passive? when casted outside max range, it works, but it also pop some sort of little "Ghost" Q. Only karthus players can see it, but it throws me off all the time :/
